meanings.sent1: After selling his old car, he reinvested the money in a new business venture.
meanings.sent2: She always reinvested her earnings to grow her savings.
meanings.sent3: The magician reinvested the disappearing coin back into his pocket for another trick.
meanings.sent4: The seeds of hard work he planted in the past were reinvested into a flourishing career.
meanings.sent5: The student reinvested her time and effort into studying for the exam, hoping for better results.

meanings.definition: Put money back into an investment
meanings.sent1: He decided to reinvested his profits from the stock market into buying more shares.
meanings.sent2: The wise investor always reinvested the dividends to maximize returns.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel reinvested its acorn stash back into burying them for the winter.
meanings.sent4: She reinvested her savings into a new business opportunity, hoping for growth.
meanings.sent5: The farmer reinvested his earnings into purchasing new equipment for the farm.

meanings.definition: Used profits to make further investments
meanings.sent1: The entrepreneur reinvested the profits from his first venture into expanding his business.
meanings.sent2: They always reinvested their earnings to create more wealth for the future.
meanings.sent3: The chef reinvested the extra income from the restaurant into experimenting with new recipes.
meanings.sent4: The artist reinvested the money earned from selling paintings into buying better art supplies.
meanings.sent5: The company reinvested its profits into research and development for innovative products.
